item.title: Math Problems 1
item.description: I will write about some math problems I find interesting. I think my goal will be to qualify for AIME through AMC 12. I started competition math very late but I guess enjoying it is more important than starting time. Maybe my CP experience will help me, or maybe this may help my CP experience. 1. https://mathdash.live/problem/6602937808c7d9edd61d1d8e Substitution gives $7x + 7y = 63$ so $x+y = 9$. Squaring it gives $x^2 + 2xy + y^2 = 81$ and using $xy=6$ again the answer is $x^2 + y^2 = \boxed{69}$
